brachiation.name: Brachiation
brachiation.effect: {{NAME}} is capable of incredible athletic feats.{{OPTIONLIST:vars.options}}

options.bounding: {{NAME}} may, as an instant Athletics action, leap up to {{TOOLTIP:tiny-tooltip,{{CALC:2 * {{VALUE:scarPower}}}} meters,2 × {{NAMEVALUE:scarPower,unsigned}}}}. Further, when using a {{NAMEVALUE:dex}} + {{NAMEVALUE:athletics}} roll to mitigate damage from falling, the Remade gains one additional success, with each success reducing falling damage by one. This can reduce the lethal damage from a fall at terminal velocity.
options.wallCrawling: {{NAME}} can climb sheer, vertical surfaces as quickly and as easily as {{he}} walks on flat ground — at {{his}} normal {{NAMEVALUE:speed,unsigned}} and without preventing the use of {{his}} hands. In most cases, such movement is automatic, but especially slippery surfaces may require Athletics rolls to avoid complications that resemble the {{TOOLTIP:tilt-card,Knocked Down Tilt,json.tilts.knockedDown}}, except affecting {{NAME}}'s movement on a vertical surface.
options.leaper: {{NAME}} may, as an instant Athletics action, leap up to {{TOOLTIP:tiny-tooltip,{{CALC:5 * {{VALUE:scarPower}}}} meters,5 × {{NAMEVALUE:scarPower,unsigned}} = 15}}. {{He}} suffers no damage from falls unless {{he}} lands on a dangerous surface.
options.spider: {{NAME}} can climb sheer, vertical surfaces and cling to the bottoms of horizontal surfaces, including ceilings - moving at {{his}} full {{NAMEVALUE:speed,unsigned}} while retaining the use of both {{his}} hands.

effect.1: {{NAME}} possesses a defensive shell or protective shield that protects {{him}} from harm. When this Variation is active, {{NAME}} has an armor rating of {{SWITCH:vars.armorChoice,kevlar,1/3,leathery,2/0}}.
effect.2: {{NAME}} possesses a defensive shell or protective shield that protects {{him}} from harm. When this Variation is active, {{NAME}} has an armor rating of {{SWITCH:vars.armorChoice,flak,2/4,steel,3/0}}.
effect.3: {{NAME}} possesses a defensive shell or protective shield that protects {{him}} from harm. When this Variation is active, {{NAME}} has an armor rating of {{SWITCH:vars.armorChoice,flak,{{SWITCH:vars.armorChoiceB,bulletproof,2/6,dense,3/4}},steel,{{SWITCH:vars.armorChoiceB,bulletproof,3/2,dense,4/0}}}}. Additionally, {{SWITCH:vars.armorChoiceB,bulletproof,{{NAME}} never takes damage from firearms that lack the armor-piercing quality,dense,{{NAME}} doesn't suffer the automatic point of bashing damage if this Variation reduces damage from a source to zero}}.
effect.4: {{NAME}} possesses a defensive shell or protective shield that protects {{him}} from harm. When this Variation is active, {{NAME}} has an armor rating of {{SWITCH:vars.armorChoice,flak,3/6,steel,4/2}}. Additionally, {{NAME}} never takes damage from firearms that lack the armor-piercing quality, and doesn't suffer the automatic point of bashing damage if this Variation reduces damage from a source to zero.
effect.5: {{NAME}} possesses a defensive shell or protective shield that protects {{him}} from harm. When this Variation is active, {{NAME}} has an armor rating of {{SWITCH:vars.armorChoice,flak,3/6,steel,4/2}}. Additionally, {{NAME}} never takes damage from firearms that lack the armor-piercing quality; doesn't suffer the automatic point of bashing damage if this Variation reduces damage from a source to zero; and, after applying armor against a source against which armor provides protection, reduce any remaining damage to one (if a source would inflict multiple types of damage (bashing, lethal, or aggravated), it inflicts one point of the worst type of damage.

cuttingLash.name: Cutting Lash
cuttingLash.effect:
This Variation allows {{NAME}} to attack enemies with an arsenal other than a Baseline’s punches and kicks. The manifestations of this Variation are as varied as the Broken themselves, and may be purchased any number of times to represent different means of attack. Although Discrete, effects that increase or decrease a Variation’s Magnitude can be used on this Variation.

  • The Lash is a {{SWITCH:vars.combatSkill,athletics,ranged weapon with a range of {{USE:vars.range}} meters,brawl,melee weapon,firearms,ranged weapon with a range of {{USE:vars.range}} meters,weaponry,melee weapon}}.
  • Activating the Lash {{IFIN:quick,vars.options,is a reflexive action}}{{IFNOTIN:quick,vars.options,requires an instant action}}. Once activated, the Lash remains active until the end of the scene.
  • Attacking with the Lash is a (separate) instant action, and is resolved with a roll of {{USE:vars.dicePoolFront}} - {{USE:vars.dicePoolBack}}.
  • The Lash deals lethal damage with a base damage rating of {{IFIN:deadly,vars.options,{{USE:vars.deadlyDamage}}}}{{IFNOTIN:deadly,vars.options,{{USE:vars.baseDamage}}}}.

options.channel: Channel: On a successful attack with the Lash that deals at least one point of Lethal damage after armor, {{NAME}} reflexively activates the {{DISPLAY:vars.channelVariation}} and applies its effect to the target. The victim may contest {{NAME}}'s successes on the attack roll with the appropriate Resistance + Supernatural Tolerance roll. This activation of {{DISPLAY:vars.channelVariation}} can only affect the target(s) of the Lash, and even if the Lash can target multiple opponents in a turn, {{DISPLAY:vars.channelVariation}} cannot affect more targets than it normally could. If the {{DISPLAY:vars.channelVariation}} is Controlled, the Lash suffers from {{DISPLAY:vars.channelVariation}}’s entangled Scar in addition to its own.
options.soporific: Soporific: On a successful attack with the Lash that deals at least one point of Lethal damage after armor, the Lash inflicts the {{TOOLTIP:tilt-card,Drugged Tilt,json.tilts.drugged}}.
options.burst: Deviation - Burst: The Lash behaves as a {{TOOLTIP:rules-card,medium burst,Medium BurstFirearms AttackUses 10 bullets. +2 bonus to attack action. Can attack up to three targets, rolling individually against each and suffering a −1 penalty per target after the first. {{SOURCE:DtR/198}}}}.

burst.name: Burst
burst.tooltip: The Lash behaves as a medium burst.

electrokinesis.name: Electrokinesis
electrokinesis.effect: {{NAME}} has influence over electronics and electricity. While this Variation is active, {{NAME}} can affect objects in range with a Size no greater than the Variation's Magnitude times Scar Power ({{CALC:this.value * scarPower}}). Additionally:{{OPTIONLIST:vars.options}}

options.conductivity: {{NAME}} increases or decreases the conductivity of the air surrounding a target. This can shield electronic and non-electronic targets (including people) from electricity and EMPs, reducing electrocution damage by twice Scar Power ({{CALC:2 * scarPower}}). Alternatively, {{he}} can direct an existing source of electricity at a nearby target, potentially damaging a device (by overloading it or exposing it to a localized EMP) or inflicting damage no greater than twice Scar Power ({{CALC:2 * scarPower}}) (dependent on a viable source within range).
options.input: {{NAME}} can spoof passwords and other access credentials, bypassing local security protocols. This cannot grant network access (including via VPN) unless the server where the target data is stored is also within range, although if the device has passwords to remote servers stored locally (including ones unlocked with a fingerprint or by facial recognition), these still function normally.
options.output: {{NAME}} can alter the output of an electronic device, causing it to display whatever {{he}} wishes, within the device's limits. {{He}} can alter the images and sound coming from a TV, cause a phone to ring and produce the sound of a voice when answered, or any number of other tasks. Particularly complex feats, such as fabricating a convincing news broadcast out of whole cloth, may demand Scar Finesse rolls and/or relevant Skill rolls to make believable, at the Storyteller's discretion.
options.power: {{NAME}} can feed or starve an electronic device, powering it on or off even in the absence of a viable power source. This can “hotwire” a device that usually requires a physical component, such as a switch, button, lever, or ignition. If the device controls other devices (such as a control terminal that directs an entire assembly line of robots, or the ignition of a car that is otherwise in operational condition), it is possible to control much larger machinery, as long as the subordinate devices have an existing power source.
options.research: {{NAME}} can rapidly analyze an electronic device to which {{he}} has gained access (or which lacks security), locating any data on it that {{he}} is seeking as long as it is stored on the target device. This reduces the interval of relevant extended actions by a full step — from hours to minutes or from minutes to turns.

effect.1: {{NAME}} uses the {{DISPLAY:vars.skill}} Skill with superhuman adroitness. {{He}} is always treated as having an applicable Specialty when using {{DISPLAY:vars.skill}}, does not suffer untrained penalties with it, and achieves an exceptional success on three successes instead of five.
effect.2: {{NAME}} uses the {{DISPLAY:vars.skill}} Skill with superhuman adroitness. {{He}} enjoys a half Scar Power (+{{ROUNDUP:{{CALC:{{VALUE:scarPower}} * 0.5}}}}) bonus to {{DISPLAY:vars.skill}} rolls; is always treated as having an applicable Specialty when using {{DISPLAY:vars.skill}}; does not suffer untrained penalties with it; and achieves an exceptional success on three successes instead of five.
effect.3: {{NAME}} uses the {{DISPLAY:vars.skill}} Skill with superhuman adroitness. {{He}} enjoys the rote quality and a half Scar Power (+{{ROUNDUP:{{CALC:{{VALUE:scarPower}} * 0.5}}}}) bonus to {{DISPLAY:vars.skill}} rolls; is always treated as having an applicable Specialty when using {{DISPLAY:vars.skill}}; does not suffer untrained penalties with it; and achieves an exceptional success on three successes instead of five.

multicompetence.name: Multicompetence
multicompetence.tooltip: {{NAMEVALUE:scarPower}} additional Skills are affected by this Variation: {{DISPLAY:{{INLINELIST:vars.multiSkills}}}}.

effect.1: {{NAME}} uses the {{DISPLAY:{{INLINELIST:vars.skill,vars.multiSkills}}}} Skills with superhuman adroitness. {{He}} is always treated as having an applicable Specialty when using those Skills, does not suffer untrained penalties with them, and achieves an exceptional success on three successes instead of five.
effect.2: {{NAME}} uses the {{DISPLAY:{{INLINELIST:vars.skill,vars.multiSkills}}}} Skills with superhuman adroitness. {{He}} enjoys a half Scar Power (+{{ROUNDUP:{{CALC:scarPower * 0.5}}}}) bonus to rolls with those Skills; is always treated as having an applicable Specialty when using them; does not suffer untrained penalties with them; and achieves an exceptional success on three successes instead of five.
effect.3: {{NAME}} uses the {{DISPLAY:{{INLINELIST:vars.skill,vars.multiSkills}}}} Skills with superhuman adroitness. {{He}} enjoys the rote quality and a half Scar Power (+{{ROUNDUP:{{CALC:scarPower * 0.5}}}}) bonus on rolls with those Skills; is always treated as having an applicable Specialty when using them; does not suffer untrained penalties with them; and achieves an exceptional success on three successes instead of five.

naturalTalent.name: Natural Talent
naturalTalent.tooltip: The number of Skills affected by this Variation increases to all {{DISPLAY:vars.skillCategory}} Skills.

effect.1: {{NAME}} uses all {{DISPLAY:vars.skillCategory}} Skills with superhuman adroitness. {{He}} is always treated as having an applicable Specialty when using {{DISPLAY:vars.skillCategory}} Skills, does not suffer untrained penalties with them, and achieves an exceptional success on three successes instead of five.
effect.2: {{NAME}} uses all {{DISPLAY:vars.skillCategory}} Skills with superhuman adroitness. {{He}} enjoys a half Scar Power (+{{ROUNDUP:{{CALC:scarPower * 0.5}}}}) bonus to {{DISPLAY:vars.skillCategory}} Skill rolls; is always treated as having an applicable Specialty when using them; does not suffer untrained penalties with them; and achieves an exceptional success on three successes instead of five.
effect.3: {{NAME}} uses the {{DISPLAY:vars.skillCategory}} Skills with superhuman adroitness. {{He}} enjoys the rote quality and a half Scar Power (+{{ROUNDUP:{{CALC:scarPower * 0.5}}}}) bonus to {{DISPLAY:vars.skillCategory}} Skill rolls; is always treated as having an applicable Specialty when using them; does not suffer untrained penalties with them; and achieves an exceptional success on three successes instead of five.

superhumanAttribute.name: Superhuman {{DISPLAY:vars.attribute}}
superhumanAttribute.effect:
{{NAME}}'s {{DISPLAY:vars.attribute}} possesses the potential to exceed the talents of even the most competent Baseline human. {{His}} {{DISPLAY:vars.attribute}} increases to {{MAX:{{CALC:{{VALUE:{{USE:vars.attribute}},base}} + {{VALUE:this.value}}}},{{CALC:{{VALUE:this.value}} + 3}}}}.{{BR}}However, the +{{CALC:{{MAX:{{CALC:{{VALUE:{{USE:vars.attribute}},base}} + {{VALUE:this.value}}}},{{CALC:{{VALUE:this.value}} + 3}}}} - {{VALUE:{{USE:vars.attribute}},base}}}} bonus this Variation provides does not apply to:

  • the calculations or effects of supernatural abilities
  • the activations of Variations
  • computations of Scar Power, Finesse, or Resistance

The bonus still applies when resisting or contesting supernatural effects, and can be used to meet the prerequisites of Merits.{{IFTRUE:this.value >= 3,{{BR}}Additionally, {{INLINEOPTION:vars.attribute}}}}

options.int: {{NAME}} knows things {{he}} could not possibly know and draws correct conclusions even in the absence of all the facts. Once per chapter, {{NAME}} may introduce a bit of lore or trivia. {{He}} could describe the club that just opened across town, for example, or describe a rare species of insect that has markings strangely similar to those on the giant insect {{he}} is investigating. This piece of information becomes a fact that {{NAME}} can immediately share to grant the {{TOOLTIP:tilt-card,Informed Condition,json.conditions.informed}} to {{his}} allies regarding the topic.
options.dex: {{NAME}} possesses perfect balance and incredible grace. {{He}} uses the higher of Wits ({{VALUE:wit}}) or Dexterity ({{VALUE:dex}}) (={{MAX:{{VALUE:wit}},{{VALUE:dex}}}}) when calculating Defense (instead of the lower of these). Whenever an outside force would push, pull, or drag {{NAME}} off a precipice, {{he}} catches {{himself}} before the fall occurs and can pull {{himself}} safely back onto the ledge as an instant action. If {{NAME}} would fall due to a slippery horizontal surface — such as in an area affected by the {{TOOLTIP:tilt-card,Slick Tilt,json.tilts.slick}}, {{he}} may choose either not to fall or to fall but rise to {{his}} feet at the beginning of {{his}} next turn as a reflexive action.

effect.2: In a matter of seconds, {{NAME}} transforms into a monster that walks upright like a person.{{BR}}The monstrous form possesses two Magnitude • {{DISPLAY:this.type}} Variations, all of which activate when Monstrous Transformation activates -- though Directed Variations still require an action to target.{{BR}}Although Monstrous Transformation grants secondary Variations, the Sacred Flesh Variation can grant it to another character.
effect.3: In a matter of seconds, {{NAME}} transforms into a monster that walks upright like a person.{{BR}}The monstrous form possesses two Magnitude •• or three Magnitude • {{DISPLAY:this.type}} Variations, all of which activate when Monstrous Transformation activates -- though Directed Variations still require an action to target.{{BR}}Although Monstrous Transformation grants secondary Variations, the Sacred Flesh Variation can grant it to another character.
effect.4: In a matter of seconds, {{NAME}} transforms into a monster that walks upright like a person.{{BR}}The monstrous form possesses two Magnitude •••, three Magnitude ••, or four Magnitude • {{DISPLAY:this.type}} Variations, all of which activate when Monstrous Transformation activates -- though Directed Variations still require an action to target.{{BR}}Although Monstrous Transformation grants secondary Variations, the Sacred Flesh Variation can grant it to another character.
effect.5: In a matter of seconds, {{NAME}} transforms into a monster that walks upright like a person.{{BR}}The monstrous form possesses two Magnitude ••••, three Magnitude •••, four Magnitude ••, or five Magnitude • {{DISPLAY:this.type}} Variations, all of which activate when Monstrous Transformation activates -- though Directed Variations still require an action to target.{{BR}}Although Monstrous Transformation grants secondary Variations, the Sacred Flesh Variation can grant it to another character.

predatorsCunning.name: Predator's Cunning
predatorsCunning.effect: {{NAME}} possesses an uncanny situational awareness. {{He}} always manages to stand with some object between {{himself}} and the enemy sniper. Guards searching for {{him}} always seem to arrive moments after {{he}} turns a corner and ducks out of sight. And {{his}} gun clears the holster a split second before the ambush.{{OPTIONLIST:vars.options}}

options.elusive: If a guard or searcher would make a roll to notice, find, or tail {{NAME}}, the roll suffers a -2 penalty. In addition, {{NAME}} enjoys a {{TOOLTIP:tiny-tooltip,+{{ROUNDUP:{{CALC:0.5 * {{VALUE:scarPower}}}}}},Half Scar Power ({{VALUE:scarPower}}) = +{{ROUNDUP:{{CALC:0.5 * {{VALUE:scarPower}}}}}}}} bonus to rolls to avoid surprise and identify, avoid, and disarm traps — whether it is a trip wire that sets off a rockslide or an improvised explosive device.
